text: Hanki zage hanati kaziga seli mono nomofo avuga'a kuma ante'za mani'naza nagara, Moseseki, Aroniki, ne'mofavre naga'zniane mani'neza, hunagruma hu'nea nomofo agu'afina Israeli vahe'mokizmigu hu'za eri'zana eri nezmante'za mani'naze. Hagi huhampri ozmante vahe'ma ana tva'onte esnimofona ahe frigahaze.
